about_the_game:
Disclaimer: This is a cosmetic DLC. It doesn't influence gameplay and only adds visual changes to the game. It is meant to support the developer in making more games like these.

This DLC unlocks the following features:

  • Your name will be mentioned in the credits of the game as seen on the screenshot.

  • Your Steam Avatar is a painting somewhere in the game. It's still a hidden object game, so it's up to you to find it!

  • Your Steam Friends are shown as paintings somewhere in the game. It's still a hidden object game, so it's up to you to find them!

Thank you for your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit only
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Your Steam Friends are shown as paintings somewhere in the game. *It's still a hidden object game, so it's up to you to find them!
